ij
Class VirtualStack

java.lang.Object
  ij.ImageStack
      ij.VirtualStack
Direct Known Subclasses:
AVI_Reader, FileInfoVirtualStack, ListVirtualStack
public class VirtualStack
extends ImageStack

This class represents an array of disk-resident images.

          Default constructor.
